course.subject: ENGG
course.name: Robotics Special Project: The NXP Cup National University Students Intelligent Car Racing 2018
course.description: The NXP Cup National University Students Intelligent Car Racing is a national competition for young engineers. Student teams will design and manufacture the racing model car for tackling with different missions and challenges which is provided the organizer. Normally, a project report is required. Enrollment in the project course may require instructor's approval. May be graded PP.

reviews.author: _Daniel
reviews.title: Amazing Grades
reviews.comment_content: Excellent. Students learn how to make amazing car robots that follows a white track with black edges. Materials actually overlaps with multiple other courses. We need to program with C++ on an embedded system. So materials in courses such as: COMP2011, COMP2012, COMP3711, COMP3111, COMP4211, etc. are taught in tutorials.
reviews.comment_teaching: There isn't any teaching in lectures since it's a experimental learning course. There are tutorials though. We need only to do self learning on the materials, and do self research on your own time.
reviews.comment_grading: Very rare course without any lectures that gives A-range grades! It does depends on how much effort you put on the project. Freeriding will of course give a poor grade.
reviews.comment_workload: The workload is manageable if you remember not to do deadline fighting. You need to know how to work with other group mates.
